import { useState} from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Message = () => { const history = useHistory(); const { info,error} = useSelector(state => state.user); const [OTP, setOTP] = useState(Math.floor(100000 + Math.random() * 900000)); const message = `Hi Your OTP is: ${OTP} ` const [textMessage,setTextMessage] = useState(message) const goBack = () => { history.push("/contacts") } const sendOTP = () => { } return ( <>

OTP Will sent to your mobile number

Hi, your OTP is : {OTP}
) } export default Message;
